title: EPIC: Job Scheduling Strategy (Prefect vs Cron)
description: Inventory Affordabot's scheduled workflows, evaluate Prefect vs cron/Railway for each category, and recommend a maintainable scheduling strategy with a small pilot migration.

title: EPIC: Affordabot Scraping Scalability & RAG-Ready Ingestion
description: Study and harden Affordabot's web scraping and ingestion for 100+ jurisdictions, incorporate patterns from City Bureau's city-scrapers project, and ensure all scraped artifacts are RAG-ready (chunked + embedded) for future LLM/RAG use.

title: EPIC: Affordabot RAG Phase 1 (Supabase Retrieval Backend)
description: Introduce a shared RetrievalBackend abstraction in llm-common and implement a Supabase-backed retrieval layer for Affordabot's legislation analysis (Phase 1 of RAG).

title: EPIC: llm-common Integration for Affordabot
description: Migrate Affordabot from its local packages/llm-common copy to the canonical shared llm-common library (~/llm-common), updating the legislation analysis pipeline and admin flows while keeping behavior intact.
